document_data.name: Phaulkon
document_data.mainbody: '''Phaulkon''' ({{Pronounce|FAL|kun|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|28}}}}) was a noble house of [[Cormyr]]ean descent residing in [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Members:
* Lord [[Bronson Phaulkon]]
* Lady [[Cera Phaulkon]], killed in a raid on a Phaulkon caravan
* Lady [[Marie Phaulkon]], eldest daughter of Lord Bronson and Lady Cera
* Lady [[Jeryth Phaulkon]], daughter of Lord Bronson and Lady Cera
* Lady [[Meryth Phaulkon]], a noblewoman from Waterdeep
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, a Phaulkon family member from Waterdeep, Meryth Phaulkon, became romantically involved with a nobleman who revealed himself to be [[Georges]], the leader of the reinvigorated [[Shadow Thieves]]. Her life became endangered when she convinced the guild leader to leave his criminal life behind and reveal the thieves to the [[Lords of Waterdeep]]. Meryth was kidnapped by the mysterious [[Xabash]] and held in his lair in [[Undermountain]], until the Shadow Thieves were defeated and the noblewoman was rescued by an agent of [[Khelben Arunsun]].
